Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Components.Transaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransaction

    public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITransaction
    Class used for processing the details of a transaction

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(java.lang.String entity,
                   ITransaction.CashflowDirection direction,
                   double agreedFx,
                   java.lang.String currency,
                   java.time.LocalDate desiredSettlementDate,
                   int units,
                   double pricePerUnit)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity taking part in the transaction
        direction - the direction of the operation (buy/sell)
        agreedFx - the exchange rate for the transaction currency to US Dollars
        currency - the currency of the transaction
        desiredSettlementDate - the date when the transaction is desired to settle
        units - the number of units to be transacted
        pricePerUnit - the price per unit
